mapper.sql:
select * from t_sys_org where org_sts = '1'
and org_name like concat('%', #{dto.orgName}, '%')
and org_status = #{dto.orgStatus}
and org_id != #{dto.excludeOrgId} and find_in_set(#{dto.excludeOrgId}, org_ancestors) = 0)
mapper.update: update t_sys_org set org_ancestors = replace(org_ancestors, #{oldAncestors}, #{newAncestors}) where org_sts = '1' and find_in_set(#{orgId}, org_ancestors)
